name: Daisy Date
description:
Daisy is looking for a boyfriend for the Christmas holidays. 

You can find it's story through Linus's eyes.

Use mouse left click to navigate

Team:

Andrei Iacob is 10 years old. He made the story, music, part of the graphics (library, school front and characters) and coded the story tokenizer, parser and interpreter and the snow effect. 

Alin Iacob, Andrei's dad made some of the graphics and coded the rest of the game.

Made with vanilla JavaScript in Visual Studio Code. Graphics made on Boox Note Air 2. Music made in GarageBand for iOS.
